title: LLM Instructions Schema
description: Schema for validating LLM instruction parameters

llmInstructions:cognitiveLevel.description: Cognitive level required to accomplish the instruction, based on Bloom's taxonomy

examples.example: Explique le principe du Product-Market Fit
Utilise cette méthode pour résoudre ce cas client
Compare ces deux stratégies de pricing
Quel est le point faible de cette approche ?

llmInstructions:temperature.description: Controls the creativity of the model

llmInstructions:top_K.description: Limits generation to the top K most probable words

llmInstructions:top_P.description: Defines the cumulative probability threshold for word selection

llmInstructions:diversityPenalty.description: Encourages global diversity in text generation

llmInstructions:lengthBias.description: Influences the length of the generated text

llmInstructions:contextLengthBias.description: Adjusts the preference for shorter or longer contexts

llmInstructions:maxLength.description: Defines the maximum number of tokens to generate

llmInstructions:includeMetadata.description: Indicates whether the output should include metadata

llmInstructions:confidenceScore.description: Indicates whether a confidence score should be generated

llmInstructions:responseLength.description: Defines a range for the length of the responses in tokens

llmInstructions:numberOfOutputs.description: Generates multiple alternative versions of a response

llmInstructions:toxicityFilter.description: Filters potentially offensive or harmful content

llmInstructions:offensivenessFilter.description: Filters content that is violent or offensive

llmInstructions:hallucinationDetection.description: Detects and mitigates factually incorrect outputs

llmInstructions:sensitiveContentFilter.description: Filters sensitive topics such as politics or religion

llmInstructions:responseTimeLimit.description: Sets a time limit for generating a response

llmInstructions:energyEfficiencyMode.description: Optimizes resource usage by adjusting energy efficiency

llmInstructions:processingMode.description: Selects between speed or quality optimization

llmInstructions:computeBudget.description: Defines a limit on the resources used for response generation

llmInstructions:enableAttentionAnalysis.description: Highlights specific parts of the input text that the model focused on

llmInstructions:displayNeuronActivations.description: Provides insights into the internal workings of the model

llmInstructions:provideJustifications.description: Accompanies each response with a justification

llmInstructions:useExamplesAndCounterExa.description: Uses examples and counterexamples to illustrate responses

llmInstructions:explainStepByStep.description: Requests the model to detail its reasoning step by step
